location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 3/31 Survey for tonnage measurement of steel barges'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged chronologically from the front to the rear of the file.
Foliation: the foliation in use is the sequence of numbers appearing in the top right hand corner of each folio.

mods.abstract: Correspondence concerning a request for tonnage measurements of steel barges. Vessels mentioned include: Ras Mishaab, Ras Mushut, Karzakkan, Muharraq, Iffley, Amirah.Correspondents include Ministry of Transport; Under Secretary of State for Commonwealth Relations; Secretary to the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf; Petroleum Concessions Ltd; Bahrein Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO); Petroleum Development (Qatar) Limited; Gray, Mackenzie and Co Ltd;
